website_summaries.verdict: These grips are great for allowing you to easily use your Nintendo Switch with a friend.
pros: Keeps your controllers from getting scratched
Easy to slip the controllers in the grip
Helps you add play-ability to your experience
cons: While the shape on this product is more comfortable than using the joy con alone, it could be  better designed

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch. No more multiplayer complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and pick these up for your Switch ASAP. I bought two sets of the red-blue to match the neon console and extra controllers I have. I've uploaded a photo to show the size compared to a Switch game case. Before I had this set, my family would complain that the controllers were hard to hold. After I ordered these, I had a party with my friends and NONE OF THEM mentioned that the controllers were uncomfortable. That makes this a top notch product to me. Triggers work great, and they are perfectly ergonomic. The colors match perfectly also (once again, see my uploaded photo).
customer_reviews.author: Hsayy

customer_reviews.title: Got a Switch for Xmas? Get these now!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Switch as a mean to play with my toddler son this holiday season. My hands aren't the biggest but those tiny joy-con controller are so uncomfortable. I immediately bought a Pro Controller and then bought these matching grip. These are so easy to slip on and off. My 3.5 y/o can do it himself. Stop the madness and get these to save your hand/fingers. These are a tad smaller than you normal controller but anything is better than using those joy-con! If you find this review helpful, please click 'helpful' button at the end of this product review. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: CTN412

customer_reviews.title: Best Out There
customer_reviews.text: Due to the lack of photos I've decided I'll post some my self to help a fello. These grips are the closest to the joycon itself color wise and serves it's purpose. Great if you're playing co-op and have larger hands than what the base joycon+strap can give. They pair really well with the Skull & Co Splatoon 2 caps. The official Nintendo Splatoon caps aren't as great. (P.S. Sorry about all the attached images but I know theirs people who rely on customer images for their purchase.? (P.P.S. Mad props to FastSnail for actually having the correct color joycons in the item's picture. Really appreciate it.)
customer_reviews.author: R z

customer_reviews.title: The best way to play w/ single joycon
customer_reviews.text: These joycon grips are great! I ordered two sets of neon yellow grips and was very pleased to find that they are virtually an exact color match to the neon yellow joycons - they blend in perfectly! The grips have a soft velvety texture and are made of a light material that seems to insulate very well, keeping my and my friends hands cool and comfortable during long play sessions. It's finally possible to play with a single joycon without cramping or hurting your fingers, and the addition of extended trigger buttons is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kole

customer_reviews.title: OK overall. Defective stick extender included but the seller does not respond.
customer_reviews.text: I have no issue with the main products - the grips. The colors match the original joycons, and I like fill of the grips. My problem is with the included stick extender, which is not the main product, but still it was defective. As you can see in the attached picture, the hole in the red one is not circular, and it does not hold the stick when attached. As I was happy with the grip, I contacted the seller and asked if I could get a replacement part, but they never responded. It was not the main product, and could be a small issue, but I was not happy with their quality control and their unresponsiveness.
customer_reviews.author: bokchoy

customer_reviews.title: An Essential For Joycons
customer_reviews.text: Great shells for people who need to use the two controllers separately. I bought these just as a novelty to have if I needed to use the controllers in split mode. I am quite impressed by the overall quality of the molds. They are easy to insert and remove the controllers. The triggers also have very little travel time which was a huge issue with the ones Nintendo provide. They have great space for your fingers. Overall a 10/10 product for the price aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great product but too light weight
customer_reviews.text: These grips are pretty good only down side is they are really light weight but I’m gonna put some tiny weights in to make it better other then that the only other negative thing is you can’t access the ZL and ZR buttons otherwise great product I recommend them for families and more casual gamers who like the joycons also the grips are nice as well! Def getting another pack!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great since you don't need those Nintendo slide on adapters
customer_reviews.text: Love this grip since I just plug in the Joy Con. Before to play 2 player I had to hunt for the slide on adapters and fight to get them on. If I put the + or - one on wrong, it was very difficult to get to slide back off. And when I was done playing 2 player, sliding off the adapter was always super hard. Using these grips is much more intuitive as well. My grandkids could never get use to the OEM adapter method for 2 player mode. Now they can play and not have difficulties with the controls or holding it. Easy for adults too. If you are playing 2-player games you need these.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela  SC

customer_reviews.title: simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: love the idea of the joycons but too small for big hands. This solved it and it was cheap. Couldn't be easier to attach and remove, makes the shoulder buttons easier to press. Mario Party is more enjoyable. I probably wouldn't travel with them (they are a little larger than I expected) but for couch coop sessions they are perfect. Can't speak to the button covers since I don't use them and don't find them necessary.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hedstrom

customer_reviews.title: WAY worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Makes multiplayer games SO much more enjoyable! They have a very unique texture. They’re a hard plastic, but a sort of soft to the touch texture... not glossy, not hard matte, almost like a micro velvet. That might sound weird, but when you get them, you’ll understand. The thumb risers don’t stay on super well. Maybe I’m just too rough with them. I suppose if I knew I wanted them forever, I could super glue them on, but they’re not that important to me. Either way, the grips get two thumbs up from me and my wife!
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have for Switch players!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like every Nintendo Switch player should have these grips for their Joy-Con's. Using the Joy-Con's this way without the grip is pretty difficult considering the size of the Joy-Con is small, the shape of it is a bit unorthodox for a controller and getting to the L/R buttons are pretty hard to get to. With these grips all that goes away with a natural controller feel like a PlayStation controller and designated L/R buttons in convenient locations for ease of press. Must have for games like Mario Kart, Mario Tennis and others.
customer_reviews.author: K-Dub

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must if you ever play with single joycons! Its ridiculous how uncomfortable joycons are to use, but these grips make it so much better! I don't know if this is still the case, but the green/pink pair came in a nice, matte finish, whereas the red/blue pair came with a glossy finish. I personally liked the matte finish better because the red/blue would feel greasy/slippery after some use.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great accessories for racing and fighting games
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these cause well I got fat hands lol these do help and make the joy con way more comfortable. I liked then so much I ordered a second set. The joy cons just slip right in and they are super user friendly. The extra joy con joy stick covers are a well added bonus. We put the extra large ones on a nykon controller for my mom who has arthritis amd she said it makes a major doffence for her. So keen that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: David Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these! I purchased these on a whim, and was not disappointed. The controllers are easy to hold and ergonomic. They fit well in your hands. The material is hard and durable. The joy-con controllers are easy to remove and insert. The color matches perfectly. There are a few silicone pieces included, I am assuming to put over a few of the buttons. However, I don't see the point in using them.
customer_reviews.author: EThread

customer_reviews.title: Work great, even if the brand on the box is different from the brand on the product page.
customer_reviews.text: Colors are exact, controllers slide in and out easily without feeling like they'll fall out, and they function just fine. My one issue is that the brand I bought was FastSnail, but the brand on the box was Dobe. I've never heard of either brand, so it doesn't matter that much, it's just indicative of Amazon's slow but inevitable slide into Ebay territory: you can't really trust what you're buying. When it comes to cheap controller grips, that's fine. But I hesitate to buy more expensive items where the brand does matter.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, does it job
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is great! Its certainly not the same as having a controller like PS4 or something, but that's the fault of the actual controller's not these holders. My boyfriend and I like to play local multiplayer games, and this is certainly a really great cheap option to keep your hands from cramping around those tiny devices. They're lightweight, and very easy to put the controllers into. I had a few issues with the L and R buttons the first time I used them, but for some reason its not a problem anymore at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice aftermarket Switch Joy-Con holders
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice aftermarket Switch Joy-Con holders. My son and I have quite a bit of time using these and we both like them. They do not have springs in the buttons but the feel when pressing them makes it feel like they do. They are quite comfortable in your hands. I would pick these over the Joy-Con straps any day. My only complaint if you can call it that is that they are just a tad bit slippery. With that said, they are not going to fall out of your hands randomly. I prefer this texture over adding a coating that would rub off or come off over time with use.
customer_reviews.author: Buys Stuff I Don't Need

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help my boyfriend 6'4 hold the controls better. It's ok. If it's in your budget to buy the better real controller types I would. The color of these matches the switch remotes and would be good for kids. Not sure if I am making my life harder, but you have to go to the setting on the switch and change it to the controller modes before actually detaching the switch remotes. Otherwise the console will not automatically reorient the remotes when you play with them detached on landscape.
customer_reviews.author: cakeNbacon

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the joy cons can be used individually for two player, but they are awfully small, especially for a man with larger hands. I bought these so my boyfriend would be more comfortable when playing Super Smash and couldn't recommend them more highly to give you more of a normal controller feeling! Much more comfortable than just holding the joy con on it's own!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Janisch

customer_reviews.title: Will do Mario Kart, but not good for Mario Party
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to put in and remove, but not wide enough to hold for an adult. The size of grip is more suitable for kids or teenagers. If they can make the width about PS4 controller that will be perfect. The feeling of rubber material is good and comfortable. Overall not perfect but still great, hard to use it for Mario party but ok for the Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.author: DDT-Sun

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have been enjoying the Switch lately; I purchased lots of party/multi-player games. The FastSnail Grips are wonderful!! They hug the controllers nicely, making it easier to manage the controls; easy to put on/take off; and sturdy/comfortable design. We are very happy with the product, we bought 6 in all colors and they match the Switch colors very well!
customer_reviews.author: tSt

customer_reviews.title: Problem with joystick covers
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are nice. They're not super comfortable, but much better than the joycons without them! Problem was the joystick covers. We put one on and when we tried to take it off, it broke the top of the joystick off :( I'd still recommend these, but don't use the joystick covers!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: clicky shoulder buttons, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I picked these up to make it a little easier to hold the tiny joycons when we're playing together. These work great and are very simple. One thing I didn't expect, is that these make the should buttons feel clicky and gives them a bit of feedback to your fingers, which helps with games like mario kart (for drifting). These are also small enough to easily fit in a little Switch bag. We're very happy with these little grips.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisPFries

customer_reviews.title: Way Better Than Holding Joy-cons Alone
customer_reviews.text: These are a HUGE upgrade from holding a single joy-con and I'm surprised Nintendo doesn't make something like this. These are so comfortable and the bumper buttons work way better than the super small ones on the back of the joy-con. These are a must-have for any Switch owner.
customer_reviews.author: Xander Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! The controllers for the Nintendo switch are so tiny, my 8 year old son and my husband both had complained about how tiny they are. I saw these and bought them right away. They were a reasonable price so I figured they were worth trying! Both my husband and my son love them and they finally played a game together for more than an hour last night. We all would recommend buying these covers!
customer_reviews.author: lovemykids05Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: A must for people with big hands!
customer_reviews.text: I love these controller grips! Very ergonomic, almost feels like an old GameCube controller with just a little more finger space. Also the plastic has a nice feel to it too. It's like a nice vinyl touch. Not like those cheapo-depo plastic stuff that starts to deteriorate and get sticky in a couple of years. Also the trigger buttons have springs for the ZR & ZL buttons. To give it that nice tactile response. Very nice touch. Also great price range too! To be fair the switch controller by itself is very uncomfortable to hold with two hands especially if you're a 6' 3" Giant like me. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Necessary upgrade for 2-player Joy-Con experience
customer_reviews.text: Work great and make 2-player games much more comfortable; tiny Joy-Con controllers are passable but really need this product if you're going to be playing for a while. My girlfriend says the controllers can start to slip out, but I've never experienced this in 30+ hours of play. She also hops and twists and is in general harder on her controllers when the race gets tough, so that could be user error...
customer_reviews.author: McBronzeGod

customer_reviews.title: Soft plastic, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: These are a million times better than trying to hold a tiny controller! And they’re soft! They aren’t the hard shiny plastic I figured they would be. Legit for the price on a two pack. Got red and blue, came with 2 large thumb grips and four slim thumb grips (the silicone cover thing)
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Gaming easier!
customer_reviews.text: My friend got these for his switch he liked these so much her purchased another pair. First off you cannot beat the price. But also it makes playing on his switch so much easier. The small joycons can be tough to use but these grips make it much more comfortable. Perfect size, colors are vibrant, material is nice. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amart

customer_reviews.title: Turns single joycons into cute mini controllers
customer_reviews.text: Functional, much better ergonomics than just the joycons themselves. Seems sturdy, and the material surface does not scratch the joycon plastic. Overall Very satisfied. The rubber joystick covers, albeit improve thumb comfort, don't really work, they hinder the range of motion of the sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Yinzhou Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the Amazon Basics, but close.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be nicer than the amazon basics version, especially since they are charging more. These don't feel quite as high quality. These don't feature a hole on the back for pushing the joycon out like the amazon basics, however that isn't as big a deal because the joycons don't fit as tightly in the grips. Still, the colors are nice, and they are still a decent product, but if you are wanting the nicest ones, my vote goes to amazon basics.
customer_reviews.author: Holden Van Houten

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for??? Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I am quite impressed with the build quality of these grips. It actually feels like a real controller now. The color scheme is wonderful and the texture feels nice to the touch. Oh yeah, shoulder buttons are PERFECT! I have no complaints at all, top notch product. Buy these my friends... This is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: G. Eoshley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comparability!
customer_reviews.text: This controller is made out of a soft rubber material that makes it comfortable to grip. I was worried about how well the controller would seat inside. The dimensions are perfect, and allow you to use some heavy-duty left and right triggers instead of the dinky ones provided by Nintendo. Perfect score, I cant wait to buy more for my other two controllers!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Yet Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly bigger in person than in picture, so traveling with these might be a pain if you do end up playing portable practically anywhere. I usually try out a product for a month to see how well it hold up and it has been more than 2 months since purchase and they hold up great, grant it the plastic fills cheap and there really isn't much grip to these but they feel pretty comfortable anyways, it is far better than just using the strap bumpers and cramping your hands after words, it is a simple device but helps when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiplayer
customer_reviews.text: These grips are very comfortable and have a nice rubber-like material that provides a balance with enough rigidity to grip comfortably, but also enough flexibility for easy insertion and removal of the joy-cons. If playing a game like Mario Kart 8 Deluxe or Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, it makes for a lot better controller in multiplayer games than just the joy-con strap, while being a lot cheaper than buying Pro controllers for everyone. My only downsides are that the player indicator light can't shine through the top like on the straps, and the red doesn't match the Neon Red joy-con as much as the blue, which is pretty much spot-on. Otherwise, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kannas

customer_reviews.title: Great little grips!
customer_reviews.text: The switch joy cons are difficult to use individually when playing games and these grips help with that. They match the joy cons perfectly and add functionality and make them ease list to hold. These are definitely a necessity for any switch owner if you plan on playing with an individual joycon controller. I got these for a good price and the quality is great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Great for using switch as 2 player for easier play than the normal small controller. Great for adults and kids to use. Easy to put in, a little tough at first to take out, but once you start using it, it gets easier.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and will buy another pair for second set of JoyCons
customer_reviews.text: Just as the picture shows. Super easy to install JoyCon controllers and just as easy to pop out controllers for charging. Works well for fixing issue of cramped hands for adults and such a cheap and easy way to fix the issue of the JoyCon controllers being so flat and hard to hold for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Just a dude reviewing stuff

customer_reviews.title: We have 4 of these controllers and the red/blue colors look great. As a bonus
customer_reviews.text: Must have for the switch when playing Mario Kart. Makes the controllers large enough for my adult hands but also works for the kids. My biggest concern was the triggers but luckily I have had no problems at all. We have 4 if these controllers and the red/blue colors look great. As a bonus, they protect the joy-cons from drops. Highly recommend these grips!
customer_reviews.author: Christian B.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These joycon grips are an excellent solution that Nintendo failed to come out with. They have more of a GameCube controller feel which is a favorite of mine. I just purchased Street Fighter Ultra and these actually make it playable multiplayer on the go. I like that colors are available unlike Nintendo's joycon colors which are always out of stock. I plan on buying a second pair of Joy con controllers and these are a must-have. These are simple sturdy and lightweight and I like the rubberized grip that holds the joy con in place.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Can't play without them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the FastSnail Grips for the Nintendo Switch. The controllers for the Nintendo Switch are rather small. So buying the FastSnail Grips and being able to easily pop the controllers in works great! I literally cannot play without them! I would definitely recommend the FastSnail Grips if you have the Nintendo Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: These work so well! My nephew was obsessed with this when he came to play my switch. He thought they were the coolest things ever. They are pretty cool too. Make playing games way easier without spending much money. 10 out of 10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dcay

customer_reviews.title: Can't play without them
customer_reviews.text: A single Joy-Con is barely playable by itself. It is very small and awkward. These grips are fantastic and the one time we forgot them it was unbearable to play. Also, the colors match perfectly on the 4 different ones I have bought. The right Joy-Con is still wonky because the joy stick is more centered, but that is a Switch problem, not these grips.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Colors don’t match
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it makes it so much easier to play 2 player games with one set of joy cons. It’s easier to hold and comfortable allowing you to hold on to a little more surface area. The only concern I have is that the red is a neon pink in person. The blue matches, but not the red.
customer_reviews.author: Alaysha

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Switch Owners
customer_reviews.text: Ok first of all these things should be standard with the Nintendo switch. It makes multiplayer fun without the awkwardness of getting used to the standard method of holding the single remotes. The grip is familiar to anyone and easy to grab and just play. I’ve used it on Mario Kart, Bomber Man, and Overcooked so far and having these makes four players super fun and competitive without the hassle of complaining “I lost because of the funny controller”. Also I have re purchased this already and now have 6 in my collection in various color schemes.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Joy-con Accessories for Multiplayer Games!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic!! I love these so much! It's very easy to put the joy cons in and take them out and stay perfectly in place! The joystick covers are a nice extra as well. I have 4 siblings and we play a lot of games in where we split the joycons and it was uncomfortable to use before this! I rarely review but these deserved it. I wholeheartedly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Good grips and a nice bonus
customer_reviews.text: Good grips also the package had some button covers that were a nice bonus. Easy to insert and remove. Of course the joycons still need to be periodically charged occasionally off the main device so you cant have them permanently installed.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer way to play!
customer_reviews.text: This made playing on the joycon a ”joy”! Puns aside, this a great addition to the switch especially if you have larger hands. My only caveat is that i wish this remote had a way to use the shoulder buttons without removing it from this holder. Not a big inconvenience, but still something to consider. I will probably but more on these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Burgett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter controllers
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a cheap alternative to a controller for my Joy cons and this is what everyone needs. The Joy cons slide in easily and the don't ruin the controller. It feels nice to hold and because of how inexpensive they are, I recommend this for people who just got their Switch. They also come with grips for the Joy stick and they work so well. They don't impair your movements when playing smash Bros but improve them. The controllers are very easy to travel with because they fit nicely in a pocket or a carrying case. For what they're worth, they should be charging extra.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Williams

customer_reviews.title: Won't play without
customer_reviews.text: These grips are...AWESOME! I have such a hard time trying to play Mario Kart with those tiny joy cons but grips are literally a game changer! The joy cons are super easy to get in and out but when they are in it's a perfect and secure fit. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: GenieJean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The joycons fit perfectly. Easy to put in and easy to remove all the while staying place while you play. However, one minor flaw I had, is that on the blue joycon, the A button is a slightly uncomfortable distance away from your thumb, and so is the analog stick on the red joycon. This may annoy some, but didn’t bother me after I played for a few minutes. Overall, good concept and good execution at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Rohrig

customer_reviews.title: Fits pretty good. Hard plastic. Not soft.
customer_reviews.text: I like them, testing them out tonight. They fit good. One button is riiiiiiight on the controller button so let’s see if it isn’t pressing on the button unless we press it
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. No compatibility issues whatsoever with the joy-cons. Allows us to all play together without the discomfort of holding the tiny joy-con alone. Give the feel of a smaller but yet comfortable game controller.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeItUp

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I saw in the comments section that these are a little light/hollow and that some people did some DIY weight addition to the handles. I spent no extra money doing this; I opened the controllers up, caulked 8 nickles in each handle, and screwed it back together. Now my wife and I don't feel like we're holding cheap plastic controllers while we're screaming at each other in Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Springer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: I just love these for Mario Kart. This is the second set of these holders I have bought. They are smooth to the touch, easy grip, and joy cons fit perfectly. I have had no any issues when pressing the top buttons as I did with another set of holders. Not pricy and does the job, very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: decatur e cavender

customer_reviews.title: Best grips
customer_reviews.text: The grips fit perfect, easy to remove. I love that they're non slip grip. Comes with toggle cap for a larger thumb area or a small toggle cap for that non slip feel. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, works great.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cool! They work fine. Some complain about the R and L buttons but they seem okay to me. ONLY complaint I have is you have to take the controller out to reach the Zr and Zl buttons. But that’s a given when it’s a pop in holder.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect add-on controllers.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little grips for your Switch controllers. I bought 4 of these to make playing the new Mario Party easier. They look great and they fit perfectly in your hands. This is a must accessory for any Nintendo Switch player. They also come with nice grip covers for the joysticks. Take a look at my pics, these things look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I like them and would consider getting two more. They’re just great any time I have someone with adult sized hands, myself included, that needs to use a single joy on for some reason. My 7 year old totally doesn’t care, but all the adults that have tried them have given them high marks.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Makes individual Joy-Cons infinitely more useable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the original Joy-Cons, but the four tiny controllers just weren't cutting it in intense games of Mario Kart. These grips elevate the feel of each Joy-Con up to Pro Controller conditions. The trigger buttons are exactly as responsive as any other controller and the red/blue color scheme and texture match the original controllers perfectly. We don't use the included joystick grips, but they're a nice addition and might come in handy for others. If you don't want to spend a fortune on controllers and enjoy big group multiplayers games, these are a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any game that you will not need to access the joycons actual triggers so these are a no go for games like Mario party, but BUY THEM FOR MARIO KART!!! Best things ever, if on the they made a case for these things cuz they sound so cheap banging against each other when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Babbitt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement for the money! Helps you feel like less of a clumsy giant when wielding a joycon. Reduces the hand cramping that can come from doing so for a long period of time. Most importantly, the shoulder buttons seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: ManiacalShen

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the Switch family
customer_reviews.text: Light, but strong. Inexpensive, but not cheap. I have large hands so the little remotes were almost unusable. Would rather them be a little bigger still, but then again that’s what my new pro controller is for!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ducks

customer_reviews.title: after about a month of regular use, these are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of these to get all the colors I needed to match my joy cons. (and gave the extras away to friends) They are awesome! They feel comfortable in my hands, the buttons are satisfying, and the texture is just what I was hoping it would be, slightly rubbery, but solid. I hope they stay like this for a long time, but right now I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For bigger hands, this makes the joy cons so much easier to use. I wish they would have put a notch in the side so that you'd have access to the shoulder and Z buttons for Mario party, but otherwise these work perfectly. They were also useful when playing at my cousin's house, because they protected the joycon from his 4-year old.
customer_reviews.author: Dart

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets of these for Mario Kart so the whole family could play and boy were these worth it. They are SPOT ON in color with the Red and Blue OEM Nintendo controllers. Easy on, easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Married With Children

customer_reviews.title: you need these!
customer_reviews.text: i have purchased several sets of these, they’re indispensable if you every play Mario Kart or any game with more than two players sharing a console.
customer_reviews.author: K.L. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Cute product
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I got them so my boyfriend and I could play Smash easier and they work great. It’s a lot better than holding the joycons and your hands won’t cramp up after playing for a while
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Great housing for the joycon!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was advertised was what I got. The plastic's texture and feel are outstanding and honestly surprised me. The triggers feel really good. The only thing is the - controller works more comfortably then the + because of the joystick in the center; however the joystick toppers they include make it slightly more comfortable. I got the red blue ones and the pink and green ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Bores

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase! The Joycons are a bit small when used as separated controllers and these work well to remedy that. Well constructed, especially considering the cheap price point.
customer_reviews.author: W. Allen

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy them!
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice options for using the Joy-Cons individually. The Joy-Cons are so small that your hands get sore after a while. The grips are so comfortable that you can play for much longer. The colors are perfect for the neon red and blue Joy-Cons!
customer_reviews.author: Julio Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love these controller cases/handles!
customer_reviews.text: The small Nintendo Switch controllers alone were hard for my husband to grip and hold onto, so we looked into getting something to pop them in that would make them resemble more of an original gaming system controller. I found these and for the price you can't beat them! It came with the red and blue controllers as well as rubber pieces to go over the joystick. Overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Melton

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much that I order another set. I'm so use to holding Xbox/PlayStation controllers that without these, the Nintendo controller itself is too small and feels weird, atleast in my hands
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Manu

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These grips are excellent. The joycons fit into them easily and quickly with no damage after months of use. The shoulder buttons are especially nice for playing games like Mario Kart. Plus, they're pretty inexpensive and brightly colored. I'd definitely recommend trying them out!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: You HAVE to get these!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! My family had a Wii years ago and we loved to play Mario Kart. When I bought the Nintendo Switch, I kept getting complaints from my family about how hard it was to hold the controllers. Yesterday I received these in the mail and I was so excited to try them out! My family LOVED them! These are amazing and make it so easy to hold the controller! These are a must buy if you have the Nintendo Switch!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hofman

customer_reviews.title: Everything works like a charm. A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: These controllers are the cuties thing. I get compliments all the time with the kids and playing a 4 player game. So much easier to hold hand just the joy stick itself. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Her

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must!
customer_reviews.text: Switch controllers feel very small in an adult hand, there's no getting around that...at least until you've bought some of these bad boys! They feel just like you're holding an average sized controller and they work seamlessly. A must for any Switch owner!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: These are very inexpensive but just right for little hands. I like the little joy stick button that makes it bigger and easier to manipulate. These are great! We even decorated them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Making single joycon use infinitely more bearable
customer_reviews.text: I have man hands, and having to play with a single joycon is less than fully enjoyable, especially in any games that require the use of the shoulder buttons. These grips remedy that problem. The grips are well made, feel great to hold, and the joycons are easily put in place and removed without fear of being scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my controllers. Before these grips, my hands would cramp holding the tiny controllers. But now WITH the grips no more hand cramps!! Great durability!! Highly suggest this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good size to accommodate all sizes, but watch out if you’re in the NBA. Good texture and the colors seem to match pretty well. The grips are a nice touch although they can easily be turned from a loose, or non tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: SkyNet

customer_reviews.title: Best Joycon grip I've used!
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish of the product is excellent. I love the texture and it's comfortable for hours of playing. the colors are a perfect match and the shoulder buttons are easy to reach and very responsive. GREAT product that I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisL

customer_reviews.title: A must for party gaming
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item! Makes gaming super easy when playing with others! Comfortable to use and joysticks are easily to place and remove
customer_reviews.author: NikiMuffin

customer_reviews.title: “Spongy” R and L don’t impact performance!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth between this and a few other options. I was most worried about some reviews calling the R and L spongy. Rest assured, it works just fine. There is no delay and the controller works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was recently gifted the green and pink version of these, and I've loved them for certain multiplayer games. They're comfortable, feel good, and are nicely colored. The only reason it isn't perfect 5-stars is because it feels ever so slightly off in shape, so it's comfy, but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The answer for big/adult hands
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way that I'm able to use a single joycon. It makes a night and day difference. They also color matched the neon blue and red colors perfectly. I didn't care much for the joystick caps, but I consider those an nice extra.
customer_reviews.author: Strider

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and extremely light.
customer_reviews.text: They certainly make the Joy-Cons easier and more comfortable to hold. What I found most surprising about them was how light they are. This is not a criticism, and if anything it helps that they are so light; I was just expecting something heftier and found the practical weightlessness of the grips to feel somewhat strange. This is simple to get used to but for those with rambunctious children, the grips might not be as durable as you would like them to be. All in all, it was a worthwhile purchase and I heartily recommend this product to other Switch users.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These have a nice, slightly grippy texture, and match the color of the joycons perfectly. The only minor downside is that they don't give you any way to access the (normal) shoulder buttons which are now on the left side when the joycons are rotated. I'm not sure if that will ever matter, but some games might want to use those.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.text: These grips are great! So I bought another set for my other JoyCons. They 100% match in color and they feel great in the hand if you're looking for a great solution that won't bankrupt you in the process. No need to buy expensive controllers to plug in to the switch, just pick up a set of these instead!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Pretty simple, cheap, and well-made
customer_reviews.text: They are very cheap but well-made. They serve their purposes pretty well. Grip makes it pretty comfortable to have good control on any games. These grips are definitely one of my primary items to bring whenever i'm bringing my Switch to friend's place or any gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Y. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great! No more cramping!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. When I first saw them I thought why not try them out, even though I usually don't get gimmicky accessories. The first time I used them for MarioKart I really noticed a difference. My hand wasn't cramping and I was able to play for hours. Some people are saying that the shoulder buttons are hard to use with these but I have not found that to be true. Drifting in MarioKart has never been easier. I will probably be picking up another pair once I get more joycons. Also the blue and red colors are almost identical to the joycon colors which makes it even more attractive to use. Don't think about it, but these!
customer_reviews.author: MariaMelon13

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great pick up for anyone with a switch. Shoulder buttons have good click action. Only downside is mario party sometimes needs you to hold the controller like a wiimote and you can't access the shoulder button when it is configured on the switch itself.
customer_reviews.author: William J.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Got the red and blue ones for my red and blue joycons, had to get the green and pink ones for that set as well! They're great to use if you feel the joycons are just a little too small for you and they are very similar to how a Gamecube controller feels.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Jones

customer_reviews.title: So much better
customer_reviews.text: Cramps when you are playing!? Super ouch, but with these not so much! I have small hands and the controllers were not even working well for me, but with these grips, I definitely feel a difference.
customer_reviews.author: KellyVH

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price at all
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price at all. It feels a little cheap and the controllers still feel a little small in your hands. The whole purpose we got them is because he end controllers are tooooo small and end up cramping your hands after a few rounds of MARIO kart. These are a bit bigger, but still overall small.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Good color match, good feel.
customer_reviews.text: I have the yellow joycon and the colors matched them pretty well. I like the larger analog stick caps because they give you greater leverage for more precise movements, and they help them feel like proper sticks you'd see on Xbox or PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Helping lil hand have a easier time
customer_reviews.text: Makes game play easy by controller easy to hold and different colors make it easy to tell who is who in game play
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They do their exact job very well. No worry about the joy con's coming out. Can be hard to sore while traveling but that's just the nature of things like this, you can just throw them in a diffrent bag.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and feels comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is meant to do, which is provide standard controller style fit to Nintendo Switch JoyCons. The material is durable, has been dropped several times already and feels good to the touch. The material is this matte finish which helps with grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with large hands
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are great. I'm an adult but a big kid at heart and using the little joy con's with large hands wasn't the most comfortable thing in the world. These little things change that. They hold the joy con very well without being to tight where it gets stuck. Theres little rubber pieces that grip it well. I'm going to order another pair for my other 2 controllers
customer_reviews.author: nicole zernhelt

product_meta.title: FastSnail Grips Compatible with Nintendo Switch Joy-Con, Wear-Resistant Handle Kit Compatible with Switch Joy Cons Controllers, 2 Pack (Blue and Red)
feature_bullets: FASTSNAIL EXCLUSIVE MATERIALS - FASTSNAIL grips made of exclusive materials, with premium rubber non-slip matte surface for excellent grip. DIFFERENT with the other grips on Amazon. Scratch free, attractive appearance, touch is the best.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN - IMPROVER SL and SR buttons to extend the lifespan. Ergonomic design provides superior grip and enhanced comfort. Allow you to play for longer such as Mario Kart and Street Fighter Ultra.
COMFORTABLE TO HOLD - Perfect for those extended, high-stress gaming sessions. Grab control and elevate your game with the FastSnail Grip Kit.
ONE MODEL FOR BOTH SIDES - Since it is a dedicated design, operation of each terminal and button can be convenient while keeping the case attached.
PROTECTION - Since it is a special cover, it can protect your Joy-Con firmly from everyday wear and tear, scratches and dirt.(NOTE: No include Switch and Joy-Cons.)
